origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_policy_effect', 'description': 'This function evaluates the effect of a specific financial policy on a given sector, including the analysis of policy documents, measures, and loan data impact.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the financial policy to analyze.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector to evaluate the policy effect on.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'includeLoanData', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include loan data analysis in the effect evaluation.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'effectReport', 'description': 'A comprehensive report on the policy effect on the specified sector.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_policy_effect, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyName'是'financial_support_agriculture', 'sector'是'agriculture', 'includeLoanData'是'true'.
